talk.author: did:plc:zvx3peoxyy55jtqztfb334up
talk.utter:
What BS is saying is, "WE won't use your data. But BS is an open internet platform and others may (and probably will) use all data posted on here for AI training."

That's just the new normal though. Nothing online is either protected or sacred. It's all open game.

talk.author: did:plc:bdf5bbbttzyeqrf6lggucvlx
talk.utter: Govt should ban AI for good..they are trying to replace human beings..they are stealing our jobs and data.. govt needs to pull the plug in this insanity..

talk.author: did:plc:zvx3peoxyy55jtqztfb334up
talk.utter: It will all backfire horribly on these people and corps force-feeding us this stuff. In the meantime, just remain excellent at what you do! Machines will never truly replace human endeavor, regardless of what they say. Smart companies will see that and not take the bait.
